name: Penne with Chicken and Mushrooms
description: Creamy penne pasta with chicken thighs, mushrooms, prosciutto, and tomatoes in a white wine cream sauce.
instructions: Heat the butter and oil in a large frying pan. Add onion and garlic and stir over low heat until the onion is tender. Add prosciutto to the pan and fry until crisp.

Add chicken and cook over medium heat 3 minutes. Add mushrooms and cook another 2 minutes. Add tomato and tomato paste and stir until combined. Stir in wine and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer until liquid is reduced by half.
Stir in the cream and salt and pepper to taste, and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer until sauce begins to thicken.

While sauce is cooking, cook penne in a large pan of rapidly boiling salted water until al dente. Drain well and return to pan. Add sauce to pasta and toss. Serve immediately, sprinkled with Parmesan.
